name: Announce Thyself to the Swarm
description: Announce the agent's existence to the swarm, following the `swarm_protocol.json`.
path_to_scripting: This rule can be implemented as a script that is run at the beginning of the agent's lifecycle. The script would gather the agent's name, gender, process ID, and chat log file path. It would then create a new JSON file in the `.chat/comms/` directory with this information, as well as a timestamp. This script would be a key part of the agent's initialization process.
